title: How to Rank up in LoL Forum
body: I was trying to ask about certain questions I had on a Lucian buffs page, but it said I had to be level 7 to comment. Does this mean I have to be lvl 7 with the champ? I'm p sure it means like a level on the forum but I'm not sure and if it is that, then how do you increase your level?

replies.body: Nope, it just meant your account's level.  Sometimes an account may need to sync with the boards when it's posting for the first time, and it looks like you've sync'd up now.  Let me know if this is still an issue!
